code: export var BASE_URL='https://auth.nomoreparties.co';function checkResponse(res){if(res.ok){return res.json();}else{return Promise.reject("\u041E\u0448\u0438\u0431\u043A\u0430: ".concat(res.status));}}export var register=function register(email,password){return fetch("".concat(BASE_URL,"/signup"),{method:'POST',headers:{'Accept':'application/json','Content-Type':'application/json'},body:JSON.stringify({email:email,password:password})}).then(function(res){return checkResponse(res);});};export var authorize=function authorize(email,password){return fetch("".concat(BASE_URL,"/signin"),{method:'POST',headers:{'Accept':'application/json','Content-Type':'application/json'},body:JSON.stringify({email:email,password:password})}).then(function(res){return checkResponse(res);}).then(function(data){if(data.token){localStorage.setItem('jwt',data.token);return data;}});};export var getContent=function getContent(token){return fetch("".concat(BASE_URL,"/users/me"),{method:'GET',headers:{'Accept':'application/json','Content-Type':'application/json','Authorization':"Bearer ".concat(token)}}).then(function(res){return checkResponse(res);});};
